original: // a ti'i sa bcad bzhugs so //
analyzed: a ti sa gcod bzhugs so

original: kun gsal ye shes klong la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: kun gsal ye shes klong la phyag tshal lo

original: a ti rnal dgongs 'di la gnyis te /
analyzed: a ti rnal dgongs di la gnyis te

original: man ngag gi don gcig char du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mtshan bstan pa dang rim gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: man ngag gi don gcig char du rtogs ba byed ba phyir mtshan ston ba dang rim gyis rtogs ba byed ba phyir gzhung ston ba

original: mtshan bstan pa la gsum ste /
analyzed: mtshan ston ba la gsum ste

original: mtshan sgra don san mar gyi rnam par ltar bshad pa dang / gzhung don a ti nges pa gzhan rung ba'i rnam pa ltar bshad pa dang / man ngag nges pa'i snying po gzhan gang dang ma 'dres par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan sgra don san mar gyi rnam ba ltar chad ba dang gzhung don a ti nges ba gzhan rung ba rnam ba ltar chad ba dang man ngag nges ba snying po gzhan gang dang ma dre ba ston ba

original: rim gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhung bstan pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: rim gyis rtogs ba byed ba phyir gzhung ston ba la gnyis te

original: chos kyi bcom ldan gzhung la ras chod dag gzu lum yid dpyod spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi joms ldan gzhung la ras chod dag gzu lum yid dpyod spong ba phyir

original: dbang po'i tshul gyis rang rig pa'i don la yid ches pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa dang / gzhan dngos la brtan pa'i rig pa de nyid don rim gyis phye nas rtogs par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po tshul gyis rang rig ba don la yid ches ba phyir phyag tshal ba ston ba dang gzhan dngos la brtan ba rig ba de nyid don rim gyis byed nas rtogs ba ston ba

original: de la bsdus pa'i don drug ste /
analyzed: de la sdud ba don drug ste

original: dang po rdzogs pa chen po rang gi don la theg pa so so'i 'dod pa ci byung yang mnyam par bstan pa dang / ma rig rig par bstan pa'i chos dang sems kyi bsdus pa gang la yang 'bral ba med par bstan pa dang / a ti rang gi 'jug tshul sku gsum 'ja' la sogs par snang grags kyis chos las spyod la spyad du bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dang po rdzogs ba chen po rang gi don la theg ba so so dod ba ci byung yang mnyam ba ston ba dang ma rig rig ba ston ba chos dang sems kyi sdud ba gang la yang bral ba med ba ston ba dang a ti rang gi jug tshul sku gsum ja la sogs ba snang grags kyis chos las spyod la spyod du ston ba dang

original: rig pa gtan tshigs dam bca' ba nges par rang gi gnad dang bcas pa dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i gnad rang thog nas gsal ba la gzhan sun 'byin pa dang / rang 'dod phyin ci log par bstan pa dang rtsom a ti rang rdzogs pa po rig pa mthar phyin pa 'bad pa med pa'i bsngo ba thun mong ma yin pa dang bcas te bstan pa dang drug go /dang po la nang don lnga ste /
analyzed: rig ba gtan tshigs dam chos ba nges ba rang gi gnad dang cha ba dang rdzogs ba chen po gnad rang thogs nas gsal ba la gzhan sun byin ba dang rang dod phyin ci log ba ston ba dang rtsom a ti rang rdzogs ba po rig ba mthar phyin ba bad ba med ba sngo ba thun mong ma yin ba dang cha te ston ba dang drug go po la nang don lnga ste

original: dog pa dmar nang don dang po nges pa rang gi che ba dang bcas te bstan pa dang / gnyis pa chos nyid 'bad pa med pa'i gnad nges par de nyid dog pa dan bshad par dam bca' ba'i chos nyid rang gi 'dug tshul bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dog ba dmar nang don dang po nges ba rang gi che ba dang cha te ston ba dang gnyis ba chos nyid bad ba med ba gnad nges ba de nyid dog ba dan chad ba dam chos ba chos nyid rang gi dug tshul ston ba dang

original: gsum pa nang tshod rdzogs pa chen po nyid la khyad par med par gzhan 'dod sems so so'i mdor bstan pa chos thams cad mnyam par bstan pa dang / bzhi pa grub pa'i mtha' la spyod pa'i 'dod pa rgyas par bshad pa rang ngo la thams cad khyad med du bstan dang /
analyzed: gsum ba nang tshod rdzogs ba chen po nyid la khyad ba med ba gzhan dod sems so so mdor ston ba chos thams cad mnyam ba ston ba dang bzhi ba grub ba mtha la spyod ba dod ba rgya ba chad ba rang ngo la thams cad khyad med du ston dang

original: lnga pa rdzogs pa chen po'i don la tshig gi phan btags pa sems kyis mtshan nyid gtan la phebs pas lan pa /
analyzed: lnga ba rdzogs ba chen po don la tshig gi phan dogs ba sems kyis mtshan nyid gtan la phebs ba lan ba

original: bsdus pa'i don gnyis pa ma rig par bstan pa chos dang sems de phyir tshig kyi bsdus pa'i gang la yang 'bral ba med par bstan pa la nang don lnga ste /
analyzed: sdud ba don gnyis ba ma rig ba ston ba chos dang sems de phyir tshig kyi sdud ba gang la yang bral ba med ba ston ba la nang don lnga ste

original: dang po a ti yo ga 'bad de la rnam par pa med pa las grol ba'i chos nyid dbye ba la bzlas par bstan pa dang / gnyis pa phyi rol gyi 'dod pa sun phyung ba'i dgos pa rang 'dod pa khas len pas zhen 'dod nyams par bya ba shes bya la yang thogs pa med par bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dang po a ti yo ga bad de la rnam ba ba med ba las grol ba chos nyid byed ba la bzlas ba ston ba dang gnyis ba phyi rol gyi dod ba sun byin ba dgos ba rang dod ba khas len ba zhen dod nyams ba byed ba shes byed la yang thogs ba med ba ston ba dang

original: gsum pa des na thams cad 'khrul snang las 'khor ba 'das ma myong 'das pa mi nyid pa las kyi rig pa rang gi man ngag gi gnad kyis che ba dang bcas pa bstan pa dang / bzhi pa shes bya dang shes pas bsdus pa'i chos can gang la 'brel ba dpe dang bcas pa bstan pa dang /
analyzed: gsum ba des na thams cad khrul snang las khor ba da ma myong da ba mi nyid ba las kyi rig ba rang gi man ngag gi gnad kyis che ba dang cha ba ston ba dang bzhi ba shes byed dang shes ba sdud ba chos can gang la brel ba dpe dang cha ba ston ba dang

original: lnga pa yul sems la 'brel pa med pa'i gnad kyis skye ba snga phyi med pas chos nyid la 'gyur ba med par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: lnga ba yul sems la brel ba med ba gnad kyis skye ba snga phyi med ba chos nyid la gyur ba med ba ston ba

original: spyi don gsum pa /
analyzed: spyi don gsum ba

original: a ti rang gis 'dug tshul sku gsum ja log pas /
analyzed: a ti rang gis dug tshul sku gsum ja log ba

original: snang grags kyi chos la spyad du yod pa nang don bzhi ste /
analyzed: snang grags kyi chos la spyod du yod ba nang don bzhi ste

original: dang po rdzogs pa a ti mtha' bral chen po bya ba ltos gzhi dang bral ba'i gnad man ngag gi mtshan nyid nye bar bsdus nas bshad pa rang gi ngo bo dang bcas par bstan pa dang / gnyis pa sku gsum bya sku gsum lus kyi log pas ldem po dgongs pa'i don sangs rgyas kyis brjod pa las nye bar rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dang po rdzogs ba a ti mtha bral chen po byed ba ltos gzhi dang bral ba gnad man ngag gi mtshan nyid nye ba sdud nas chad ba rang gi ngo bo dang cha ba ston ba dang gnyis ba sku gsum byed sku gsum lus kyi log ba ldem po dgongs ba don sangs rgya kyis rjod ba las nye ba rtogs ba mtshan nyid ston ba dang

original: gsum pa bya ba'i rgyud la sogs te /
analyzed: gsum ba byed ba brgyud la sogs te

original: shes bya phyin ci log tu rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus ci byas kyang khams gsum las mi grol bar bstan pa dang / bzhi pa 'gro ba med par gyis dang bcings pa las ldog pa'i ldem po chos nyid kyi gnad kyis gzhan la phan par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: shes byed phyin ci log tu rtogs ba brtson grus ci byed kyang khams gsum las mi grol ba ston ba dang bzhi ba gro ba med ba gyis dang ching ba las ldog ba ldem po chos nyid kyi gnad kyis gzhan la phan ba ston ba

original: bsdus pa'i don bzhi pa rig pa gtan tshigs kyi dam bca' nges pa rang gi gnad dang bcas par bstan pa don drug ste /
analyzed: sdud ba don bzhi ba rig ba gtan tshigs kyi dam chos nges ba rang gi gnad dang cha ba ston ba don drug ste

original: dang po de ltar mi srid rig pa gtan tshigs la sogs pa mdor bstan pa dang / gnyis dbye ba la brten nas sangs rgyas yang ni rjes pa par bstan pa dang / 'bros pa'i mthar gsum pa rang gis 'dod pa rnam grangs la brten nas gtan la dbab par bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dang po de ltar mi srid rig ba gtan tshigs la sogs ba mdor ston ba dang gnyis byed ba la rten nas sangs rgya yang ni rjes ba ba ston ba dang bros ba mthar gsum ba rang gis dod ba rnam grangs la rten nas gtan la bebs ba ston ba dang

original: bzhi pa a ti grol ba'i rnam pa la nges pa bstan pa dang / lnga pa de ltar rnam grangs dang / rnam grangs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad la zla ba dang bcas par bstan pa dang / drug pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gnad ye shes zhes bya shes pa tsam gyis chos nyid ma thog tu grol bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi ba a ti grol ba rnam ba la nges ba ston ba dang lnga ba de ltar rnam grangs dang rnam grangs ma yin ba chos thams cad la zla ba dang cha ba ston ba dang drug ba rdzogs ba chen po gnad ye shes zhes byed shes ba tsam gyis chos nyid ma thogs tu grol ba ston ba

original: bsdus pa'i don lnga pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gnad rang thog na gsal na gzhan 'dod sun 'byin pa rang 'dod phyin ci ma log par bstan pa la nang don lngas bstan te /
analyzed: sdud ba don lnga ba rdzogs ba chen po gnad rang thogs na gsal na gzhan dod sun byin ba rang dod phyin ci ma log ba ston ba la nang don lngas ston te

original: e ma ho dang po a ti rang gi gnad shin tu zab pa'i don che ba dang bcas par bstan pa dang / gnyis pa dngos po gshis kyis ci ltar skye ba'i thabs yang ni dang bcas te bstan pa dang / gsum mtha' bral yongs su pa mtha' bral rdzogs pa chen po rang gis 'dod pa don rgal lan dang bcas pa bstan pa dang /
analyzed: e ma ho dang po a ti rang gi gnad shin tu zab ba don che ba dang cha ba ston ba dang gnyis ba dngos po gshis kyis ci ltar skye ba thabs yang ni dang cha te ston ba dang gsum mtha bral yongs su ba mtha bral rdzogs ba chen po rang gis dod ba don rgal lan dang cha ba ston ba dang

original: bzhi pa grub mtha' 'dod rgyal ba'i tha 'di'i chos la rang rgyud du 'dzin pa'i zhen pa las log par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhi ba grub mtha dod rgyal ba tha di chos la rang brgyud du dzin ba zhen ba las log ba byed ba phyir ro

original: pha rol gyi 'dod gzhung sun 'byin par bstan pa dang / lnga pa rdzogs pa chen po la 'dod rgyal gyis nges par grol zhing rang lta'i tshig tsam du gtan la dbab par bstan pa'o ////
analyzed: pha rol gyi dod gzhung sun byin ba ston ba dang lnga ba rdzogs ba chen po la dod rgyal gyis nges ba grol zhing rang lta tshig tsam du gtan la bebs ba ston ba
